title: Im supposed to get unbanned today
body: today i was supposed to get un suspended or un banned it said on June 23rd 2015 and today is the date.

replies.body: You get unbanned at the same time you were banned. So if you were banned at 5:00 PM, then you will be unbanned at 5:00 PM.

Hey XxChrisxXD,

Suspensions are applied and completed with the exact time in mind; not just the date.  For example, if the suspension was applied at 4PM, you would have to wait for 4PM on the day your suspension lifts.  I believe that information is provided when you try to login, in Pacific Time.

This suspension was removed on-time, about an hour and a half ago. You should be good to go at this point.
Just be sure to work on the friendliness and teamwork in-game to avoid another suspension or ban!
can you tell what time i get unbanned pls....its been a long time without you my friends but i cant deal with this people that are trolling me yea. <3{{item:3070}}
thx i was banned at 3 in the morning
